name: HeartLess (Cole Dunham)
description:
You life is your currency! Battle against the enemy and play your cards right. Your life depends on it! 

Controls:
Each card has a random action. Click a card to attack the enemy or heal your life points. 
Spend your life points to:
-Draw more cards
-Increase your max hand size(up to 7)
-Double the damage on your next attack
-Steal an enemy card at random!
-Spy and see an enemy card

(The enemy difficulty just toggles whether or not the enemy can steal your cards and double the strength of their next attack. Also if you can't see how much the player actions cost on the right, click the box surrounding the other buttons to bring them more into the view)

Made for Ludum Dare 44
